short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Submits the current tab HTML to story generator page at Nofogzone.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When publishing a new story on https://nofogzone.com/account/new_story this extension sends the HTML in the active tab to the story editing tab, to extract different info from the page.
